channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SUREFIRE-72] IsolatedClassloader.getResources returns duplicated results
item.description:
When calling classLoader.getResources("org/springframework/core/io") every result is twice in the resulting enumeration
It doesn't happen in 2.1.3

It may have to do with the fact that classes and test-classes are twice in the classpath output

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I see the duplicate classpath entries, but no problem with duped resources normally. See the duped resources when forking.
removed duplicate listing items (but that wasn't actually affecting the classloader). This only occurs when forking AND child delegation is true.
This project has moved from Jira to GitHub Issues. This issue was migrated to apache/maven-surefire#1137.
